title: The Power of Horses: True Stories from Country Music Stars
description: Author Lisa Wysocky presents 18 country music stars with their own true, life-changing stories of horses. Each story is beautifully told and enhanced with photos from the artist's private collections. Whether you are a fan of country music, a lover of horses, or simply interested in the extraordinary bond between humans and animals, this is the book for you.
author: Lisa Wysocky
